content: be 72 82 s 92 102 sts to work in magic loop divide the sts evenly place 36 41 46 51 sts on each needle ________________________________________________________________________ gusset decreases now you ll work the gusset decreases these decreases taper the sock s sides providing a comfortable fit around your instep once complete your total stitch count will match the original cast on number serenityxknits 5 knitting in serenity row 1 work across the front sts of the sock to the marker sl marker k1 ssk k across the back sts of the sock until 3 sts remain k2tog k1 row 2 k all sts repeat row 1 and 2 until you have 56 64 72 80 sts on your needles before starting the foot your sock should be structured as follows front stitches the 28 32 36 40 sts that form the instep of the foot these are held on one needle back stitches the 28 32 36 40 sts that form the sole of the foot these are held on the second needle ________________________________________________________________________ foot now it s time to knit the foot in your mc until you ve reached the desired length ideally the sock should finish around your little toe to create a contrasting toe cut the mc join the cc and knit one row in the cc before starting the toe decreases ______________________________________________________________________ toe decreases row 1 k1 ssk k 22 26 30 34 sts k2tog k1 across your first needle k1 ssk k 22 26 30 34 sts k2tog k1 across the second needle row 2 k all sts repeat row 2 and row 3 until you have 24 28 32 36 sts remaining which will be 12 14 16 18 sts on each needle once you reach this point finish by binding off the remaining sts using the kitchener stitch ________________________________________________________________________ ruffled hem turn your sock inside out so the wrong side is facing you using your first stripe as a guideline count down 5 row from the cast on edge with a 2 25mm us1 needle pick up and knit 56 64 72 80 sts using your cc inserting the needle into the purl bumps refer to the photos on page 7 as a helpful visual guide now you re ready to knit the ruffled hem keep the right side of the fabric facing you while working the ruffle as you knit the purl bumps from both sides of the sock are sitting on top of each other row 1 - 7 knit all sts row 8 kfb all sts now you should have 112 128 144 160 sts row 9 kfb all sts now you should have 224 256 288 320 sts cast off all sts ________________________________________________________________________ finishing weave in the ends and block your sock serenityxknits 6 knitting in serenity
